topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a74c106368720282340200#post_54a74c106368720282340200
Dunbine came out in the beginning of 83. Escaflowne in 96

Escaflowne is a Fantasy Mecha Show, Dunbine is a Fantasy Gundam show.

Dunbine is basically about a Motocross biker who ends up caught in a war in the fantasy world of Bryston well. (They of course fight this war using Mecha Crafted from Giant insect shells called Aura battlers, That are Powered by People's Aura)

Edit: Also, Dunbine is fairly well known amongst mecha fans.
